articles.author: Jonathan Noble
articles.title: Albon F1 Australian GP crash triggered by tyre temperature spike - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Alex Albon says that his race-stopping crash in Formula 1’s Australian Grand Prix was triggered by a tyre temperature spike.
articles.content:
The Williams driver was running in an impressive sixth place in Melbourne in the early stages, and looked comfortably on course for a top ten finish.
However, on lap seven, he slid wide running thro… [+2006 chars]
